title: WearLoop
description: A modern cross-platform app built with React Native that helps users manage their warddrobes. The app serves as a marketplace betweem clothes donating and clothes collecting users
detailedDescription:
WearLoop is a full-featured React Native application that allows users to manage their wardrobe efficiently by allowing users to donate and collect clothes. The app promotes sustainable fashion by encouraging recycling of clothes.

Key features and tools used include:-
▷ React Native with Expo for building cross-platform (iOS & Android) mobile apps.
▷ Appwrite for user authentication and cloud-based file storage.
▷ Firebase for real-time instant messaging between interested and donating users.
▷ Responsive and minimal UI/UX prototyped using Figma.
▷ Cloud storage for persistent data access and photo uploads.
▷ Modular and scalable architecture for maintainability and performance.

title: SplitShare
description: Native android application designed for seamless group expense tracking. Allows users to log expenses in a shared environment, automatically calculates owings and maintain transparent payment records. Built with MVVM architecture, Jetpack Navigation and Room database, the app ensures a smooth and efficient experience.
detailedDescription:
A collaborative financial tracking app based on groups that allows every member to upload the bill and share that among each other easily. It offers features such as logging expenditures, calculate individual contributions, maintain payment records across teams and contains settlement features. 

Built with Android Studio, the app include below features :- 
▷ MVVM architecture for maintainable and scalable code. 
▷ Jetpack Navigation for multiscreen flow. 
▷ Room database for efficient local storage. 
▷ Recycler views for optimised and memory efficient UI components.

title: Cinemarvel Reviews
description: Web platform dedicated to Marvel movie enthusiasts, featuring authenticated user reviews and rate films. Enables fans to post detailed analysis, read community critiques, and displays aggregated rating scores for recent, popular and other genres Marvel releases.
detailedDescription:
Web platform for Marvel movie enthusiasts where users can explore their favourite or critics movie, allowing them to watch movie synopsis, community critiques and the average ratings for the movies. 

Some key features include:-
 ▷ PHP and MySql to manage backend data 
 ▷ Use of Bootstrap ensuring user-friendly and responsive UI.
 ▷ Secure login and registration to authenticate genuine users. 
 ▷ Authentic user reviews and rating system.

title: WinForms Library App
description: A dual-interface desktop application for library administrators and library users. Admins handle book management, author databases, and generate usage reports. Users can browse books, reserve books, and borrow and manage borrowings through an intuitive client interface.
detailedDescription:
A dual-interface windows forms application to manage books, authors, language etc from admin side and reserve, borrow books and manage them from user's as well as admin's interface, view their self activities etc. 

Some features of the application includes:- 
 ▷ A dual-based interface to allow admin manage books and users to explore, reserve, borrow and return books. 
 ▷ Worked with MVC architecture implementing business logic layer, data access layer and presentation layer. 
 ▷ Implemented Web Services Layer for seperation of Data access layer with presentation layer. 
 ▷ MSSql to handle the backed with web service layer

title: Scholarlink Application Design
description: A comprehensive UI/UX design project for a digital platform connecting students with academic scholarships based on the prioroties set by the users. Features a user-friendly interface, intuitive navigation, and interactive elements.
detailedDescription:
A comprehensive UI/UX design ensuring intuitive and user-centric standarads. The goal was to create a seamless, accessible, and engaging experience using established UI/UX principles. 

Some features include :- 
▷ Intuitive and user friendly design following UI/UX principles. 
▷ Performed heuristic evaluation tests to ensure user satisfaction. 
▷ Identified and demonstrated user centric design methodologies. 
▷ Created industry standard sketches and wireframes. 
▷ Performed usability testing with pre-testing and post-testing questionnaires to ensure user centric design and user satisfaction
